items.title: How To Fix PaperCut Printing Issues
items.summary: PaperCut is a print server and in this document, I will show how to fix the various errors we have seen in our environment.

items.title: Setting Up MFA For A New User
items.summary: MFA is required in a lot of places. In this document, I will show you how to get started, how to reset your MFA, and some details about the most popular authenticators.

items.title: How To Change UAC Behavior In Windows
items.summary: User account control is a part of Windows and prevents programs from changing your system. In this document, I will talk about why you would change its behavior and how to do it. Most people refer to this as UAC and I will do the…

items.title: How To Run A Message Trace In Exchange
items.summary: A message trace is a feature in the Exchange admin center and you can use it to find out what happened to an email. You will need a certain set of permissions in order to access and use the Exchange admin center. Your organization will…

items.title: How To Fix "Windows Needs Your Current Credentials"
items.summary: When you get the message “Windows Needs Your Current Credentials”, it can be frustrating. Let me show you how to resolve this notification that Windows gives you.

items.title: How To Setup A New Outlook Profile
items.summary: In this article, I want to discuss why we might want to make a new outlook profile and how to do it. This will be for a Windows machine.

items.title: How To Reset A Password In Azure AD
items.summary: Resetting a password is a frequent task in a Windows environment. For businesses that use Active Directory(AD), the password is reset in the system you used to manage it. That is the Azure AD portal for us at the present time of writing.

items.title: How To Troubleshoot Axis Cameras
items.summary:
Introduction

This article is on troubleshooting the various issues we might encounter when dealing with Axis cameras. It will grow and be updated as needed.

items.title: How To Clear The Cache In Browsers
items.summary: This page will be about clearing a browser’s cache. I will give instruction concerning Edge, Chrome, and Firefox.

items.title: How To Troubleshoot Printers
items.summary: In this article, I am going to talk about troubleshooting printers. Most businesses use them and learning how to deal with their issues is a big bonus. I talk about how to test, diagnosing failed print jobs, and power issues.
